summary: The implementation successfully addresses all BuildRequest requirements. A luxury shoe showcase website has been created with a prominent logo, clean elegant design, responsive shoe gallery, and clear contact methods (phone and WhatsApp). The sophisticated visual theme uses OKLCH color system with gold accents, serif typography (Playfair Display), and ample whitespace. All requested shoe images and logo are properly integrated. No pricing, shopping cart, or e-commerce features were added, adhering to the constraints.

hallucinated_features.description: Caffeine.ai attribution footer with UTM tracking parameters and dynamic hostname encoding
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not mention adding attribution links or marketing tracking parameters. ContactInfo.tsx includes detailed caffeine.ai attribution with UTM source/medium/content tracking that was not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Dark mode theming support with comprehensive color variables
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not request dark mode or theme switching capabilities. The index.css file includes extensive dark mode color definitions using the .dark class.
The BuildRequest explicitly lists 'User accounts or authentication' as a non-goal. Despite this, useInternetIdentity.ts provides full authentication context and AuthClient integration.
